text: Tàbí ẹ̀ ń wí pé: “Dájúdájú (àwọn Ànábì) ’Ibrọ̄hīm, ’Ismọ̄‘īl, ’Ishāƙ, Ya‘ƙūb àti àwọn àrọ́mọdọ́mọ Ya‘ƙūb, wọ́n jẹ́ yẹhudi tàbí nasara.” Sọ pé: “Ṣé ẹ̀yin l’ẹ nímọ̀ jùlọ (nípa wọn ni) tàbí Allāhu?” Ta l’ó ṣàbòsí ju ẹni t’ó daṣọ bo ẹ̀rí ọ̀dọ̀ rẹ̀ (tí ó sọ̀kalẹ̀) láti ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu? Allāhu kò sì níí gbàgbé ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe níṣẹ́
